entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Static Web Assets build error with .net 6 preview 7 #20008
    untriaged
  • Unable to reference Net5.0 C# project from Net5.0 C++ project #20002
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • dotnet pack "--no-build" option is not honored for F# project references #20001
    untriaged, Area-FSharp
  • The console window displays garbled characters when type "dotnet --info" #19996
    untriaged
  • DOTNETSDK_WORKLOAD_MANIFEST_ROOTS pointing to workloads that are not lowercased fails #19994
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [Loc]With .NET 6 rc1 installed on locale OS, all strings are unlocalized when runing "dotnet workload..." in CLI. #19993
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [Loc]With net6 rc1 installed on locale OS, warning description is unlocalized when runing "dotnet publish -r win-x64" in CLI. #19992
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • Regression in .NET SDK 5.0.400: Can no longer publish WinForms/WPF app for win-arm64 (NETSDK1082) #19991
    untriaged
  • Compiler error message with unresolved parameter placeholders in VS2019 16.11: "ENC0088 Modifying the body of '{0}' will prevent the debug session from continuing due to internal error: {1}" #19989
    untriaged, Area-VS
  • dotnet watch can be extended #19988
    untriaged, Area-Watch
  • first dotnet watch build notify it was done by dotnet watch #19987
    untriaged, Area-Watch

Closed

  • Add differentiation between long and short property options in run command #19514
    Area-CLI
  • wsl2 arch linux (dotnet run) not working. Issues with path #19169
    untriaged

Updated

  • WPF/Winforms fails to run. #19871
    untriaged
  • Update implicit global usings feature to address issues #19521
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK, 6.0.1xx
  • IncludeNativeLibrariesForSelfExtract includes XML and other files into output binary #19322
    Bug, Area-SingleFile, 6.0.1xx
  • dotnet build exit with a success exit code = 0 on build failure #16241
    Area-DotNet Test
  • Upgraded to .net 6 Preview 7 and workload commands are failing #19670
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • How do I copy only specific packages to the output directory in .NET Core 2.0? #2235
    Discussion

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix path issue when elevating from Program Files #20029
    Area-External
  • [release/6.0.1xx-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/fsharp #20028
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Update dependencies from dotnet/fsharp #20027
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Update dependencies from dotnet/roslyn-analyzers #20026
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Update dependencies from dotnet/windowsdesktop #20024
  • Do not catch exceptions thrown as part of applying updates #20020
    Area-External
  • Reduce the number of middlewares that dotnet-watch adds by default #20019
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Add toolset zip as source build intermediate #20009
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • [release/6.0.1xx-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #20025
    Area-DotNet Test
  • Avoid assuming RSG in non-C# projects (#19951) #20021
    Area-External
  • [release/6.0.1xx-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/msbuild #20022
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Update dependencies from nuget/nuget.client #19807
    Area-CodeFlow
  • Fix flaky test for workload installer logs (#19941) #19971
    Area-Workloads
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Update dependencies from dotnet/msbuild #20023
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/aspnetcore #20013
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Update dependencies from dotnet/msbuild #20010
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [release/6.0.1xx-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/msbuild #20018
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [main] Update dependencies from mono/linker #20016
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Update dependencies from dotnet/roslyn-analyzers #20017
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [release/6.0.1xx-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/windowsdesktop #20015
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #20012
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Update dependencies from dotnet/windowsdesktop #20014
    Area-CodeFlow
  • Avoid assuming RSG in non-C# projects #19951
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [release/6.0.1xx-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/msbuild #20011
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [main] Update dependencies from mono/linker #20007
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #20006
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/aspnetcore #20004
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [main] Update dependencies from microsoft/vstest #20003
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/templating #20000
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [main] Update dependencies from mono/linker #19999
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Update dependencies from dotnet/templating #19998
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [release/6.0.1xx-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/templating #19997
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/templating #19995
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [main] Update dependencies from mono/linker #19990
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Update dependencies from dotnet/templating #19974
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Update dependencies from dotnet/roslyn #19969
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [release/6.0.1xx-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/roslyn #19968
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/roslyn #19967
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Update dependencies from dotnet/arcade #19885
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [release/6.0.1xx-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/arcade #19886
    Area-CodeFlow

Updated

  • Check that SDK and app archs match before setting `DOTNET_ROOT` when using `dotnet run` #19860
    Area-External, Team:Runtime
  • "Cherry pick main changes"" #19980
  • [Package Validation] resolve references when running API Compat #19771
    Area-Compatibility
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #19824
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [release/6.0.1xx-rc1] Update dependencies from nuget/nuget.client #19808
    Area-CodeFlow
  • Fix incremental in RunProduceContentAssets target. #19229
  • Restore preferred packages functionality #19878
    Area-NuGet
  • [WIP] Support installing workloads in user folder #18823
    Area-Workloads
  • Support project references to WinRT Components #19218
    Servicing-consider
  • Adding sdk check config file #19904
    source-build, Area-CLI
  • Cache results of ResolveTargetingPackAssets across builds #19570
    Area-NetSDK
